title: Beef and Kimchi Stir Fry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '2 tablespoons Korean BBQ sauce', '1 pinch chilli powder or to taste', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '450g beef steak, sliced', 'Sauce', '3 tablespoons Korean BBQ sauce', '1 dessertspoon oyster sauce', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 shallot, sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 large onion, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon water', '10 pieces kimchi, chopped', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds']
